dcterms:creator: M. Safran
M. Bar-tal
dcterms:description: A dataset generated using a model-based approach to reconstruct the left atrium from sparse samples, providing instances of LA anatomical shapes.
dcterms:title: Left-Atrium generator

dcterms:creator: A. Baram
M. Safran
A. Ben-Cohen
H. Greenspan
dcterms:description: A dataset containing left atria shapes reconstructed from a series of sparse catheter paths using neural networks, aimed at improving the mapping of the left atrium.
dcterms:title: LA shapes dataset

dcterms:creator: A. L. Schwartz
E. Chorin
T. Mann
A. Hochstadt
G. Margolis
S. Viskin
S. Banai
R. Rosso
dcterms:description: A clinical dataset used for the reconstruction of the left atrium in patients undergoing atrial fibrillation ablation, utilizing machine learning techniques.
dcterms:title: Clinical dataset
